title: Megillah (scroll of Esther) with case
description: tube with openwork design with applied grapes, candelabra, 2 tablets and plaque with liquid being poured from a pitcher into a basin, backed with copper; open crown at top; handle with twining applied vine
provenance: (Weisberg Religious Articles, New York); Collection of Harold & Mickey Smith, St. Paul, Minnesota purchased 2/12/87; Gift to the MIA in 2002.
creditline: Gift of Mickey and Harold Smith
